webpage.para: CDK News is a news letter with articles about CDK and related work started in 2004. The news letter contains a few recurrent articles, like Literature, Changelog and Frequently asked Questions, but the major part is supposed to be specialized articles about application and development of CDK, technology tutorials, and anything else related to CDK.
Issues can be downloaded from the SourceForge website:

listitem.para: articles: NMRShiftBD, What's 2004 going to bring?, Submitting articles to CDK News.
articles: Customizing file IO, First steps in the implementation of a force field for the CDK package, Spok - The Spectrum Organisation Kit, Predictor, Konqueror web shortcuts to the CDK API.

webpage.para: The editorial board of the news letter consists of Egon Willighagen and Christoph Steinbeck, who are Editor-in-Chief, Uli Fechner and Rajarshi Guha.

section.title: Submitting articles
section.para: The first issue (1/1) features an article about writing an article for CDK News, so please read that. The article mentions websources for the Latex style file and an example Latex source file for an article. Both can be found here.
